name: Associazione Teriologica Italiana onlus (Italian Mammal Society)
membership:
Federazione Italiana di Scienze della Natura e dell'Ambiente
http://www.fisna.it/
goal: Missions of the Italian Mammal Society are scientific research promotion, mammals management and conservation, dissemination of knowledge on mammals, collaboration with other national and international associations and/or public body having same goals.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Environment
euInitiatives: Alien species initiatives, Habitat Directive targets and guidelines
